pages.text: $(bgreen)Gold Leaf$() is a firm believer in solar markets. he thinks everyone can generate huge sun.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)75$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Normal$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)instant-assist$() plant that turns $(borange)gold block$() below it into $(borange)Gold Tile$(), which can let all plants standing on it to produce sun every 20 seconds. $(bred)Only live on gold block or gold tile$().
